title: Thank you Spielberg!
review: I am stunned.Once again Spielberg takes us for a ride on his brilliant road of perfection. This adventure i so overwelming and so catching, I can only congratulate Steven once more.With a beautiful story, beautiful acting and beautiful filming, this is truely one of the best movies ever made.Once again; thank you!

title: Good vs Evil
review: He did it again...Amazing; two perfect movies in a row. Both have many simularities; color-use, depressive setting. He made the good old plot; good vs evil to an emotional, and wonderfull picture.Thanx Night!

title: Brilliant
review: A brilliant sequal to the brilliant Lock Stock and Two Smoking Barrels.Snatch has the extra comedy ingrediense to make this even a better movie than Lock Stock. (Wow!! A sequal better than the original!!).The best with the movie was the triangle-scene in the middle, starting with the milk out the window.

movie_title: The Lord of the Rings: The Two Towers
title: Best, but disapointing
review: A perfect film, if there is such a thing...To bad the movie is parting so much with the book, but that has nothing to do with the movie itself..Can't wait for Kings...

title: Beyond Perfect
review: Every scene in this film is absolutely brilliant. Every dialog is so interesting that you can't turn it off. My friend, Per Christian, and myself tried to find a perfect scene, but ended up with the feeling that every single scene is perfect beyond any recognition. The greatest movie ever...by far.Two thumbs up Tarantino!!

title: YES; YES, YES
review: One of the greatest movie I've seen. It tuched me deep in my heart. Absolutely brilliant.Congratulations King.
